name: Rise Of The Phoenix Spiritual
what_you_do: I am Gladys Martin—author of I Am Phoenix Rising, entrepreneur, philanthropist, life coach, and motivational speaker.
who_you_serve: I use my voice and my story to spark hope and empower others to believe in what is possible.
social_proof: I have dedicated time and energy to supporting communities that are often overlooked or underserved.
business_focus: Empowering people to rise above their struggles and step into their fullest potential.
service_provided: writing, entrepreneurship, philanthropy, life coaching, motivational speaking
